| Property      | Attribute      | Description              | Type      | Default |
| ------------- | -------------- | ------------------------ | --------- | ------- |
| `activeColor` | `active-color` | 激活颜色                     | `string`  | `''`    |
| `lists`       | --             | 列表数据                     | `any[]`   | `[]`    |
| `overlay`     | `overlay`      | 是否支持点击遮罩层关闭当前actionsheet | `boolean` | `true`  |
| `title`       | `title`        | 标题                       | `string`  | `''`    |
| `titleSize`   | `title-size`   | 标题字体大小                   | `string`  | `''`    |
